backend/main.mo: Defines cemetery domain types, public views, content types, and comparison helpers within a Motoko actor for managing graves, deceased persons, and site content.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their purpose and key UI or logic changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom light/dark theme variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React application and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wrapper handling authentication, profile setup, routing between public/admin pages, connection status, and theme/query providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access-denied message for non-authorized users with a logout action clearing identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Admin interactive cemetery map showing graves by status and allowing grave selection for editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Admin interface for managing cemetery alleys and graves, including adding and removing entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing grave records, including deceased persons, owner data, and status.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Admin grave listing with incremental loading, search filtering, and the ability to open a create/edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading, converting, and resizing images using canvas.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: React component for selecting, previewing, resizing, and uploading images with progress tracking.
Generates a PDF of cemetery grave records using fetched data and dynamic HTML content.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin UI for editing site content sections, including hero, footer, prayers, cemetery info, and images.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Shows connectivity status using backend health checks and provides a retry mechanism when the server is unreachable.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating button enabling unauthenticated users to initiate Internet Identity login with simple error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer with contact info, office hours, bank details, and a link, using fetched content with fallbacks. Shows errors and loading states and includes copyright info.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Displays a paginated list of grave results for admins or public users with status badges, load-more logic, and optional editing dialog. Handles empty states and formats visible fields.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Implements admin and public grave search with debounced text filtering, paginated loading for admins, and full‑text search indices. Renders loading states and passes filtered results to the results list.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Displays a cemetery map with alley sections and grave tile statuses, using fetched tile and layout data. Includes a status legend and lazy mounting for performance.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with logo, theme toggle, and optional logout button. Uses site content for a dynamic logo and handles theme switching and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Shows a hero section with dynamic background, headline, and intro text fetched from site content with fallbacks. Handles loading and error states with skeletons and banners.
frontend/src/components/LazyMount.tsx: Provides a wrapper that mounts children only when near the viewport using an intersection observer. Useful for heavy components like large grids or maps.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form allowing users to enter and save their name and optional email using a profile‑save mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Grid of selectable public section tiles that triggers a callback with the chosen section ID.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Alert banner component displaying a fallback message when site content fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Performs periodic backend health checks using the actor and exposes connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a changing value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks with caching, retry logic, and error handling for fetching and mutating cemetery-related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables with smooth transition rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin interface with tabbed navigation and lazy‑loaded management components.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Implements the public-facing page with hero content, section tiles, tabbed search/map views, and scroll-to-section behavior.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Utility functions for detecting authorization and connectivity errors based on error message text.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Implements text normalization, search index builders, and in-memory full‑text search for graves in admin and public modes.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Provides functions that map grave status values to Tailwind-based style objects, labels, legend colors, and badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, container settings, animations, shadows, and CSS variables for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and existing feature requirements for the Cemetery Portal.
